effect.shortEffect: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.
effect.full: When this Pokémon is targeted by a move flagged as being reflectable, the move is redirected to its user. All reflectable moves are non-damaging, and most non-damaging moves that target other Pokémon are reflectable. A move reflected by this ability or magic coat cannot be reflected back.

description.sun-moon: Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.
description.sword-shield: Reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.
